title: Baked salmon with mango rice
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cracked coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon lemon pepper, such as Schwartz', '1 (450g) fillet fresh salmon', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '375g cooked white or brown rice', '1 mango, peeled, pitted and diced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest']
